content.text: Press Ctrl+K to open the search palette. This is a quick-access command palette that lets you search across your workspace.

content.caption: The search palette with instant results across documents, folders, and content.

items: Press Ctrl+K anywhere in the app.
Results show matching documents, folders, and content.
Click a result to navigate to it, or use arrow keys and Enter.

content.text: When editing a text document with text selected, Ctrl+K switches to link-insert mode. Select text first, then press Ctrl+K to wrap it in a hyperlink.
The search palette is the fastest way to navigate between documents in large workspaces.
